alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 14 at 11:44PM MDT until April 15 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Western Mosquito Range and East Lake County Above 11000 Feet and Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick and snowpacked roads. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
